name: Foodvania
description:
Foodvania is an action game developed by EterniTree Studio. Tells the story of a military soldier named Raya who has to look for food in the midst of a post-destruction world caused by unhealthy food contamination. This game is a 2D game that raises the Metroidvania genre where players are required to explore the world and look for important objects needed to continue progress. Raya is equipped with a machine gun, although with limited ammunition, she has to survive with this weapon to protect herself from wild mutants, wild animals that mutate due to unhealthy food contamination.

This game uses mouse and keyboard input as player controls, where players use the keyboard to move right and left using A to go right and D to go left, and also jump using the spacebar. Then players can use mouse button 1 (left click) to shoot, mouse button 2 (right click) to dash, and use various power-up utilities available in the game.
